sourcesContent:
function Statements({ statements }) { return (

Your representative published a total of {statements.num_results} during the {statements.congress}th Congress:

{statements && statements.results.map((statement, index) => (
{statement.date}
Type {bill.introducedDate}
Bill Title {bill.title}
Latest Action {`${bill.latestAction.text} (${bill.latestAction.actionDate})`}
))}
); } export default Statements;
